page.title: 03 INDUSTRY IN PEEBLES
page.content: Industry. An important employer is{ {Sonido}(manager {Mr Gilmore)}which employs 45 women & 14 men,some of whom are bussed in from nearby towns like Penicuik.{Sonido}make record player needles,diamond pivots for engraving jewellery, & leisure wear;every week they make 50,000 needles,6,000 pivots 300 sweat shirts.This independent company came to Peebles when the two American founders,holidaying at the Hydro,were offered,by councillors, the site where the factory now stands. {Mr Brett,}Production Manager of{Robert {Noble's Mill,}employs only full_time workers(88 men,75 women,2 apprentices) Built in 1884,the mill manufactures woollen & worsted coatings,jacketings & suitings (65% sold abroad).Fashion designs change every 6 months because of competition.No plans for expansion or contraction.
